Method Detail

createWrapper

public static Wrapper createWrapper(Object obj,
                                    String property,
                                    ReadOnlyCondition readonly)
Creates a Wrapper for the provided object's property, automatically updating it when the associated Widget changes.

Parameters:
obj - - the object containing the property to be wrapped
property - - the property to be wrapped (you could specify multiple levels separating properties with a dot. You can add a format using the $ sign separator after the property name. For Integer/Long fields, use - to allow the minus sign in the text box. For Date fields, put the date format patter if you don't want the default format. For Float/Double fields, the all the possibles number formats are allowed.
readonly - - the readonly condition
Returns:

createWrapper

public static Wrapper createWrapper(Object obj,
                                    String property,
                                    ReadOnlyCondition readonly,
                                    WrapperGenerator wrapperGenerator)
Creates a Wrapper for the provided object's property, automatically updating it when the associated Widget changes.

Parameters:
obj - - the object containing the property to be wrapped
property - - the property to be wrapped (you could specify multiple levels separating properties with a dot
readonly - - the readonly condition
wrapperGenerator - - the WrapperGenerator to create the widget
Returns:
